The FAQ

Get answers to common queries about our Form Backend Service. If you have more questions, feel free to contact us.

FabForm is a Form Backend Service that allows you to collect form submissions without having to write your own form backend server code.
Yes, we make uploading files from your form a breeze.
A form endpoint is a URL where form data is submitted to. You set your HTML form's action attribute to point to the endpoint.
Yes, FabForm has various advanced techniques to detect and block spam form submissions.
Yes, FabForm supports AJAX.
